Tank War: Volume Two MORNING LINE! (Strunks style)
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Coliseum (Public Monster Rancher Tournaments): Archived Topics From Prior Years: The Tank War: Tank War: Volume Two MORNING LINE! (Strunks style)
By Omni Strunks on Tuesday, September 10, 2002 - 04:09 pm:

This is now converting to a 4 monster round robin tournament for the slot of #2 in the finals.

MonsterTrainerBreedOdds
Top SeedLisa ShockWatermellony5-3
Mace WinduAnonMetal Glory2-1
Omni SnakeStrunksJungler3-1
BladeTaco MagicDurahan10-1


Ya, that's the odds look in my opinion. Lisa's top rated again! Can she take on this group of willing monsters? We shall see!

Okay, so here's the deal. I personally think Top Seed will clobber us all, but not without a fight. The Ducken has just the stats, and regen to keep up with the damage, dishing it all out. The tech array is also a unique one as it is, suitable for the tank war. The main problem for Lisa's pet would be Mace Windu. Mace..is the best Durahan, and is the same exact one I was going to raise, minus dash slash. It's got potential to dish out huge damage and do it more than once!(Something Durahans don't really do) Mace Windu has gotta be the only one here that can go toe-to-toe against Top Seed and actually get a close call. Plus..that regen is just as fasts as the next, Omni Snake. Now, as much as I like OS, he's not going to win. His techs may cost little, may be decent force...but he's just not total tank material. Who knows? He might get angry and drill assault a lot and KO everyone...but even if, that's a low probability. Surely all 3 of these monsters can keep up an assault, but Blade is not my pick of a good monster here. His tech selection isn't good enough to pull off enough damage for a 14 guts regen. Jumping Stab...bad memories.

I am eager to see that Metal Glory and Ducken whoop some tail! The second installment of the Tank War is one to be with damage and fun.

By torey luvullo on Wednesday, September 11, 2002 - 05:09 am:

here is a second opinion.

MonsterTrainerBreedOdds
Mace WinduAnonMetal Glory6-5
Top SeedLisa ShockWatermelony7-5
Omni SnakeStrunksJungler8-1
BladeTaco MagicDurahan10-1


Obviously, I see this as a two monster match. I give the slight edge to Mace Windu based on the strength of his techs. Obviously, Top Seed is equally dangerous, and would be no surprise to win either. Omni Snake has an int weakness which both the top two can exploit; Blade will wind up wishing he got that extra 200 or so life he is missing.

love the new format, and that, coupled with it being on friday night means i should be able to stay awake during the entire contest!
